task.name: Develop a Navbar for the Fan website

instructions: Head to Sanskar Tower, find a quiet spot, and connect to the available Wi-Fi. Set up your development environment and start working on the Fan website Navbar. Make sure to refer to the project documentation for guidance.

task.name: Fix a bug in Here’s Hackathon app

instructions: Head to Iit Hostel Wing, find a comfortable spot, and connect to the available Wi-Fi. Use your development environment to fix the bug in the Here’s Hackathon app. Refer to the bug report for more details.
Head to Iit Bombay Playground to pick up your son from school. Arrive at the specified time to ensure a smooth pick-up process.
